original_text: Then it went to the edge of the hill country, near Ben Hinnom valley. This was north of the Valley of the Rephaites. It continued down the Hinnom valley, south of the Jebusite city and then went on to En Rogel.
korean_text: 르바임 골짜기 북쪽 힌놈의 아들 골짜기 앞에 있는 산 끝으로 내려가고 또 힌놈의 골짜기로 내려가서 여부스 남쪽에 이르러 엔 로겔로 내려가고

sentences.original_text: Then it went to the edge of the hill country
This was north of the Valley of the Rephaites
It continued down the Hinnom valley
and then went on to En Rogel
